meanings.sent1: She concertizes beautifully, captivating the audience with her music.
meanings.sent2: The band concertizes at the local theater every Friday night.
meanings.sent3: The cat concertizes on the piano, much to the amusement of the family.
meanings.sent4: His voice concertizes the air, filling the room with melodious tones.
meanings.sent5: The sun concertizes the sky with vibrant colors during sunset.

meanings.definition: To organize or arrange a concert.
meanings.sent1: The event planner concertizes the music festival with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: She concertizes the annual charity concert to raise funds for a good cause.
meanings.sent3: The students concertize a talent show to showcase their skills to the school.
meanings.sent4: The city council concertizes a series of outdoor concerts for the community to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The committee concertizes a grand performance in the park for all to attend.
